name: A boat in the Storm
description:
Would you dare setting sail into the storm?

Your boat is quite unstable, but maybe you’ll be robust enough to handle this, you freshwater swab!

Controls: Left / Right

This is a Ludum Dare compo, liked the game? Rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/a-boat-in-the-storm and post your rank in the comments!
